name: Coxs Bazar
description: It is famous mostly for its long natural sandy beach.

name: Moheskhali
description: Moheshkhali Island is well known to the tourists for its tranquil and enchanting beauty.

name: Saint Martin
description: Saint Martin is generally known as “Narikel Zinzira” in Bengali, means 'Coconut Island' and this is the only coral reef island in Bangladesh

name: HimChori
description: You can come Himchori to see it's Waterfall, this is famous for waterfall, though in the winter season it dwindles but during the rainy season it's really a fabulous and full waterfall can be enjoyed.

name: Inani Beach
description: It has a lot of coral stones, which are very sharp. These coral stones look black and green, and they are found in summer or rainy seasons.

name: Ramu Budda Bihar
description: Ramu is known for monasteries, temples, and various Buddhist statues and images. The most important sightseeing attraction of the place is a beautiful Buddhist Temple near Bakkhali on the Tiger canal. Various Buddhist relics and Burmese handicrafts are available here. The Rangkut Bonasram Buddha Bihar is the oldest temple in the area.

name: BandorBon
description: The top attractions to visit in Bandarban are: Nilgiri Mountains,Nilachal,Nafa-khum,Sangu River,Buddha Dhatu Jadi,See all attractions in Bandarban on.

name: KhagraChori
description: Top Tourist Attractions in Khagrachari · 1. Alutila Hill · 2. Richhang Waterfall · 3. KHDC Horticulture Park · 4. Dighinala Maniker Dighi · 5. Yonged Buddha Bihar

name: RangaMati
description: Top Rangamati Tourist Spots: · Kayaking/ Boating on Kaptai Lake: · Bathing in Shuvolong Waterfall Rangamati · Holy Rajbana Vihar Rangamati.
